TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfessionalColorTable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides colors used for Microsoft Office display elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An instance of this class is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.

Docs.related: How To: Create and Set a Custom Renderer for the ToolStrip Control in Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSystemColors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseSystemColors : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use rather than colors that match the current visual style.
Docs.value: to use ; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If visual styles or themes are turned off, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> uses the colors in <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
